channel.title: Hyperion Spawn problem for staff

item.title: Hyperion Spawn problem for staff
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

if (command.equals("item") && (player.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("name1") || player.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("name2"))) { I want to make it so 2 names are here and just 2 of us can spawn! if(args.length == 2 || args.length == 3) { int id = -1; String name = null; try { id = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); } catch(NumberFormatException e) { name = args[1]; } int count = 1; if(args.length == 3) { count = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); } if (id != -1) { player.getInventory().add(new Item(id, count)); } else if (name != null) { player.getInventory().add(new Item(name.replaceAll("_", " "), count)); } } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Syntax is ::item [id] [count]."); player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Syntax is ::item [name] [count]."); } }

item.title: Hyperion Spawn problem for staff
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

What am i trying to do is simply make it so just 2 of us can spawn basically adding another ignore.case(name)

This is the method

if (player.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("****")) { I want to make it so 2 names are here and just 2 of us can spawn! if(command.equals("item")) { if(args.length == 2 || args.length == 3) { int id = -1; String name = null; try { id = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); } catch(NumberFormatException e) { name = args[1]; } int count = 1; if(args.length == 3) { count = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); } if (id != -1) { player.getInventory().add(new Item(id, count)); } else if (name != null) { player.getInventory().add(new Item(name.replaceAll("_", " "), count)); } } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Syntax is ::item [id] [count]."); player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Syntax is ::item [name] [count]."); } } }
